title: US election 2020: What has Trump said about your country?

description: Sir Sean Connery left school at 13 and delivered milk, polished coffins and laid bricks.

description: A new month-long "stay at home" order could be announced as soon as Monday, it is understood.

description: In an ex-mining community hardship is nothing new, but a two-week lockdown presents new challenges.

description: Three-year-old Eva is hailed a "hero" for her actions when her mother, Emma, had a seizure.

description: Everyone in Slovakia over the age of 10 is to be tested for Covid - but the president is sceptical.

description: Warnings for rain in Northern Ireland, much of Scotland, Wales and parts of England are in force.

description: Burnley manager Sean Dyche looks back on his eight years at Turf Moor, with Clarets fan Jordan North of BBC Radio 1.

description: A full moon at Halloween is a rare event but this year it is a blue moon which is even more unusual.

description: Drag stars Boulet Brothers chat about dressing up at Halloween and their popular reality show Dragula.

description: The racism and abuse suffered by thousands of children born to African-American fathers and white German mothers in post-war Germany.
